meanings.definition: a device used to introduce a gas into a liquid
meanings.sent1: The spargers bubbled air into the water tank.
meanings.sent2: The scientist attached the spargers to the tubing for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The spargers decided to take a break after working tirelessly all day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like spargers filling a container with bubbles.
meanings.sent5: The spargers hummed softly as they oxygenated the fish tank water.

meanings.definition: a person or thing that sparges
meanings.sent1: The spargers carefully controlled the gas flow into the solution.
meanings.sent2: The spargers in the lab were skilled at their job.
meanings.sent3: The spargers at the party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: Her words sparged out like a burst of bubbles from a spargers.
meanings.sent5: The spargers worked diligently to ensure the perfect gas mixture.

meanings.sent1: The spargers of the liquid was done with precision.
meanings.sent2: The gentle spargers of the gas created a fine mist in the air.
meanings.sent3: The spargers at the fountain made the water dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His movements were as fluid and controlled as the spargers in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic spargers of the gas brought life to the stagnant liquid.
